question:
Question: You are navigating to the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road. What is the correct summary of your trajectory from the beginning to the current position?  
Choice:  
A. I start from the parking lot, fly forward across the road, turn right, fly along the road, and reach my current position above the building parking lot.  
B. I start from above the multi-story building, fly forward and slightly to the right, cross the road, and reach my current position in front of the target building.  
C. I start from a high-rise building, move downward and forward, then turn right, fly along the road, pass through several intersections, and finally reach my current position above the building.  
D. I start from a high-rise building, fly forward, descend, then turn right, move forward along the road, turn backward, rise, then turn right, descend, and move forward.  
E. I start from the street, turn left, fly over the park, then turn right, fly along the road, and reach my current position behind the target building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point above a multi-story building, moves forward and slightly to the right, crosses over a road, and reaches a position in front of the target seven-story red brick building. This matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 25)]
Option: B
Reason: The video starts from a high vantage point above a multi-story building. The trajectory moves forward and slightly to the right, crossing over a road. The target building is the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road. The current position is in front of the target building. This matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point above a multi-story building, moves forward and slightly to the right, crosses over a road, and reaches a position in front of the target seven-story red brick building. This matches the description in option B.
